rules.title: Use JSX shorthand
rules.description: Try to use JSX shorthand for passing boolean variables. Letâ€™s say you want to control the title visibility of a Navbar component

rules.title: Use ternary operators
rules.description: Within JSX, there are multiple ways for React developers to set up conditions. You can use the if/else or switch statements, but a third way is a ternary operator.
